system.requirements:
Tier 3; Agility 40, Dodge or Parry
Aptitudes: Agility, Defence, Unaligned
system.effect: Can make one additional Evasion Attempt (Either a Dodge or Parry) once per round. Can still only make a single dodge or parry against an individual attack.

description.value: Can make one additional Evasion Attempt (Either a Dodge or Parry) once per round. Can still only make a single dodge or parry against an individual attack.
